violation.title: Dependencies not installable
violation.message: SensioLabsInsight was not able to install your Composer dependencies. If you need to customize files or run commands to make it work, you can edit your SensioLabsInsight project configuration to override the default "pre_composer_script" and/or "post_composer_script" settings.

violation.title: The composer.json file should be valid
violation.message: name : invalid value (ben/.checkout), must match [A-Za-z0-9][A-Za-z0-9_.-]*/[A-Za-z0-9][A-Za-z0-9_.-]*

violation.title: The composer.json file should be valid
violation.message: description : The property description is required

violation.title: User specific files should not appear in .gitignore
violation.message: /.idea is user-specific and should not appear in a project .gitignore. Consider adding it to the user global .gitignore instead.

violation.title: Commented code should not be committed
violation.message: Commented out code reduces readability and lowers the code confidence for other developers. If it's common usage for debug, it should not be committed. Using a version control system, such code can be safely removed.

violation.title: Methods and properties visibility should always be explicitly defined
violation.message: This method has no explicit visibility which may lead to maintenability issues. You should always declare a visibility for methods and properties.

violation.title: Unused use statement should be avoided
violation.message: The class Symfony\Component\DependencyInjection\ContainerInterface is declared but never used. You should remove the use statement.

violation.title: Symfony applications should not contain a config.php file
violation.message: This config.php file should only be used to bootstrap a Symfony application. Before releasing to production, you should remove it, otherwise attackers could get valuable insight about your application.

violation.title: .htaccess should be avoided
violation.message: A .htaccess file has been spotted. You should consider moving it to the server configuration to improve global performances.

violation.title: Default favicon should be changed
violation.message: Default default HiDPI Symfony favicon found. This reveals the backend engine of the application and makes it more vulnerable to attackers. Consider using a custom favicon instead - plus, your users will memorize your application more easily.
